channel.title: Hey, does anyone mind helping me out with something?
channel.description: Is there any possible way to completely delete all of my Moparisthebest posts or to completely remove me from the community? I haven't been active for probably 2 years or so. My main point in doing this is because I hate the 12 pages of results it finds on google when I search my username.. oh well.. thanks. I hope for replies

item.title: Hey, does anyone mind helping me out with something?
item.dc:creator: @jimmy0s Jimmy OS
item.description:
@jimmy0s wrote:

[quote=“Moparisthebest, post:25, topic:372662”][quote author=jimmy0s link=topic=468705.msg3428632#msg3428632 date=1292136626]

Fair enough, what if I instead change your display name or something?

Sounds good to me. I would appreciate it.
[/quote]

What about ‘Jimmy OS’? That way it is sort of the same, but it won’t come up in searches and no one can identify you definitively? :)[/quote]
It’s okay with me. I’m doubtful that I will use it anyway. Thank you

Read full topic

item.title: Hey, does anyone mind helping me out with something?
item.dc:creator: @jimmy0s Jimmy OS
item.description:
@jimmy0s wrote:

n10si t:

Well if it’s any consolation, I’m 19 now, so that was 5 years ago
I’m surprised no one remembers me here… I guess I was just too weird lol.

Moparisthebest:
Well, if possible, could you please delete my account and posts on here atleast? It’s not just the weird things I want gone. I have posts of weed and stuff which have no delete option…
Thanks…

Read full topic
item.source: Hey, does anyone mind helping me out with something?

item.title: Hey, does anyone mind helping me out with something?
item.dc:creator: @Greeny Greeny
item.description:
@Greeny wrote:

[quote=“Rixxx, post:9, topic:372662”][quote author=Greeny link=topic=468705.msg3427280#msg3427280 date=1292040125]
Who the hell is going to search for your username?

[/quote]
Himself.[/quote]

From him:

I want to delete it so when other people search my username they can’t find as much information about me

Himself, isn’t included in “other”, unless he’s mentally detached.

The results also blatantly show he’s got nothing on the internet to be proud or particularly ashamed of.

Read full topic

item.title: Hey, does anyone mind helping me out with something?
item.dc:creator: @jimmy0s Jimmy OS
item.description:
@jimmy0s wrote:

[quote=“Ollie, post:6, topic:372662”]ask them to delete your account, fastest way.

you can also go through all your posts manually and press remove in top right.[/quote]
So deleting my account will eradicate all my previous posts?
Thanks. And why do some posts not have the remove option?

Read full topic
item.source: Hey, does anyone mind helping me out with something?

item.title: Hey, does anyone mind helping me out with something?

item.source: Hey, does anyone mind helping me out with something?

item.title: Hey, does anyone mind helping me out with something?
item.dc:creator: @jimmy0s Jimmy OS
item.description:
@jimmy0s wrote:

Yeah… just a misunderstanding, I suppose. I may not have explained myself fully. Sorry for that… I’m not trying to spam up the community. I am really just looking for a solution. This is probably the first time I’ve posted in years; I’ve been inactive for years. This is why I would like to get rid of the posts that I made so long ago, and I don’t think deleting my account would solve the problem; the posts remain? Well, I will thank you for offering a solution to the problem you thought I was asking about, but in no way was I trying to bother the community.

Read full topic
item.source: Hey, does anyone mind helping me out with something?

item.title: Hey, does anyone mind helping me out with something?
item.dc:creator: @bowserjr2 Bowser jr
item.description:
@bowserjr2 wrote:

[quote=“jimmy0s, post:3, topic:372662”][quote author=Bowser jr link=topic=468705.msg3426757#msg3426757 date=1292013183]
Using Google, you can choose for how old your search result can be, and then you don’t need to bother MITB with it.
[/quote]
A reminder of why I left this community. Come on, you didn’t have to be that way about it. I was simply asking a question. I think you misunderstood what I said anyway. I want to delete it so when other people search my username they can’t find as much information about me… hiding the older results for myself won’t solve that problem…[/quote]
Thats another case. But you clearly said:
“My main point in doing this is because [size=16pt]I[/size] hate the 12 pages of results it finds on google when [size=16pt]I[/size] search my username”[size=18pt][/size]

If you want people not to misunderstand you, you should be clear in your questions.

Read full topic
item.source: Hey, does anyone mind helping me out with something?

A reminder of why I left this community. Come on, you didn’t have to be that way about it. I was simply asking a question. I think you misunderstood what I said anyway. I want to delete it so when other people search my username they can’t find as much information about me… hiding the older results for myself won’t solve that problem…
